p: Health systems should consistently review their healthcare supply inventories to ensure the adequacy of resources for provisions of basic protection to safe keep healthcare providers and, in turn, the public during public health crises. Drills and exercises should be planned and executed on regular bases as part of the operations in healthcare settings. Psychologically safe working cultures that prioritize self-care and interprofessional support (Perzaro, 2016) should also be incorporated as routine workflows to ensure employees’ wellbeing, subsequently improving product or service deliveries ( Nembhard and Edmondson, 2009). Therefore, healthcare administrators and clinical stakeholders can adopt positive work cultures to help midwives and nurses cope with the self-conflicts that they may experience during epidemics and pandemics.
